verses.verse: When Abram<WH87> was ninety<WH8673>- nine<WH8672> years<WH8141> old,<WH1121> Yahweh<WH3068> appeared<WH7200> to Abram,<WH87> and said<WH559> to him,<WH410> "I am God Almighty.<WH7706> Walk<WH1980> before me,<WH6440> and be blameless.<WH8549>
I will make<WH5414> my covenant<WH1285> between me and you,<WH7235> and will multiply you exceedingly.<WH3966>"
Abram<WH87> fell<WH5307> on his face.<WH6440> God<WH430> talked<WH1696> with him,<WH559> saying,
"As for me,<WH589> behold,<WH1285> my covenant is with you.<WH1> You will be the father of a multitude<WH1995> of nations.<WH1471>

Neither will your name<WH8034> any more be called<WH7121> Abram,<WH87> but your name<WH8034> will be Abraham;<WH85> for I have made you<WH5414> the father<WH1> of a multitude<WH1995> of nations.<WH1471>
I will make<WH6509> you exceedingly<WH3966> fruitful,<WH6509> and I will make<WH5414> nations<WH1471> of you.<WH4428> Kings will come out of you.<WH3318>

I will establish<WH6965> my covenant<WH1285> between me and you and your seed<WH2233> after you<WH310> throughout their generations<WH1755> for an everlasting<WH5769> covenant,<WH1285> to be a God<WH430> to you and to your seed<WH2233> after you.<WH310>

I will give<WH5414> to you,<WH2233> and to your seed after you,<WH310> the land<WH776> where you are traveling,<WH4033> all the land<WH776> of Canaan,<WH3667> for an everlasting<WH5769> possession.<WH272> I will be their God.<WH430>"
God<WH430> said<WH559> to Abraham,<WH85> "As for you,<WH8104> you will keep my covenant,<WH1285> you and your seed<WH2233> after you<WH310> throughout their generations.<WH1755>
This is my covenant,<WH1285> which you shall keep,<WH8104> between me and you<WH310> and your seed<WH2233> after you.<WH310> Every male among you shall be circumcised.<WH4135>
You shall be circumcised<WH5243> in the flesh<WH1320> of your foreskin.<WH6190> It will be a token<WH226> of the covenant between me and you.<WH1285>

He who is eight<WH8083> days<WH3117> old<WH1121> will be circumcised<WH4135> among you,<WH2145> every male throughout your generations,<WH1755> he who is born<WH3211> in the house,<WH1004> or bought<WH4736> with money<WH3701> from any foreigner<WH1121> who is not of your seed.<WH2233>

He who is born<WH3211> in your house,<WH1004> and he who is bought<WH4736> with your money,<WH3701> must<WH4135> be circumcised.<WH4135> My covenant<WH1285> will be in your flesh<WH1320> for an everlasting<WH5769> covenant.<WH1285>

The uncircumcised<WH6189> male<WH2145> who<WH834> is not circumcised<WH4135> in the flesh<WH1320> of his foreskin,<WH6190> that soul<WH5315> shall be cut off<WH3772> from his people.<WH5971> He has broken<WH6565> my covenant.<WH1285>"
God<WH430> said<WH559> to Abraham,<WH85> "As for Sarai<WH8297> your wife,<WH802> you shall not call<WH7121> her name<WH8034> Sarai,<WH8297> but<WH3588> her name<WH8034> will be Sarah.<WH8283>

I will bless<WH1288> her,<WH5414> and moreover I will give you a son<WH1121> by her.<WH1288> Yes, I will bless her,<WH1471> and she will be a mother of nations. Kings<WH4428> of peoples will come from her.<WH5971>"

Then Abraham<WH85> fell<WH5307> on his face,<WH6440> and laughed,<WH6711> and said<WH559> in his heart,<WH3820> "Will a child be born<WH3205> to him who is one hundred<WH3967> years<WH8141> old?<WH1121> Will Sarah,<WH8283> who is ninety<WH8673> years<WH8141> old,<WH1323> give birth?<WH3205>"
Abraham<WH85> said<WH559> to God,<WH430> "Oh that<WH3863> Ishmael<WH3458> might live<WH2421> before you!<WH6440>"

God<WH430> said,<WH559> "No,<WH61> but Sarah,<WH8283> your wife,<WH802> will bear<WH3205> you a son.<WH1121> You shall call<WH7121> his name<WH8034> Isaac.<WH3327> I will establish<WH6965> my covenant<WH1285> with him for an everlasting<WH5769> covenant<WH1285> for his seed<WH2233> after him.<WH310>

As for Ishmael,<WH3458> I have heard you.<WH8085> Behold,<WH1288> I have blessed him,<WH6509> and will make him fruitful, and will multiply<WH7235> him exceedingly.<WH3966> He will become the father<WH3205> of twelve<WH6240> princes,<WH5387> and I will make him<WH5414> a great<WH1419> nation.<WH1471>
But my covenant<WH1285> I establish<WH6965> with Isaac,<WH3327> whom Sarah<WH8283> will bear<WH3205> to you at this set time<WH4150> next<WH312> year.<WH8141>"
When he finished<WH3615> talking<WH1696> with him,<WH430> God went up<WH5927> from Abraham.<WH85>

Abraham<WH85> took<WH3947> Ishmael<WH3458> his son,<WH1121> all who were born<WH3211> in his house,<WH1004> and all who were bought<WH4736> with his money;<WH3701> every male<WH2145> among the men<WH582> of Abraham<WH85>'s house,<WH1004> and circumcised<WH4135> the flesh<WH1320> of their foreskin<WH6190> in the same<WH6106> day,<WH3117> as God<WH430> had said to him.<WH1696>
Abraham<WH85> was ninety<WH8673>- nine<WH8672> years<WH8141> old,<WH1121> when he was circumcised<WH4135> in the flesh<WH1320> of his foreskin.<WH6190>
Ishmael,<WH3458> his son,<WH1121> was thirteen<WH6240> years<WH8141> old<WH1121> when he was circumcised<WH4135> in the flesh<WH1320> of his foreskin.<WH6190>
In the same<WH6106> day<WH3117> both Abraham<WH85> and Ishmael,<WH3458> his son,<WH1121> were circumcised.<WH4135>
All the men<WH582> of his house,<WH1004> those born<WH3211> in the house,<WH1004> and those bought<WH4736> with money<WH3701> of a foreigner,<WH1121> were circumcised with him.<WH4135>
